author: pdobacz
content:
ðŸ§µ `evmone` state transition tests (EOF-related mainly) generated to .json or to sources?

`evmone` can now generate .json tests from its unittests. For other teams (mainly implementing EOF <@403707149043105803> <@429719902363058177> ), how much more convenient would it be for them to be .yml (or any other source form)? any preferences on the format? any preferences on the method of publishing such tests (like, as a zip file released on GH  or?...)
